questions.text: Are you legally authorized to work in the United States?
Are you currently authorized to work in the United States for any employer?
Are you authorized to work in the US?
Are you authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime and indefinite basis?

Are you authorized to work in the United States on a full time and indefinite basis? Persons authorized to work in the U.S. on an indefinite basis include U.S. citizens, lawful permanent residents, asylees and refugees.
Are you any of the following 1. US Citizen 2. Permanent resident of the United States (Green Card) or 3. Protected person under 8 USC 1324b(a)(3)
Are you a US Citizen or Permanent Resident?
Are you a citizen or national of the United States?
Are you a permanent resident of another country besides the US?
Will you now or in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status?
Do you now or will you in the future require immigration sponsorship for work authorization?
Will you require visa sponsorship now or in the future?
Do you or will you require sponsorship?
Are you at least 18 years of age?
Are you 18 years of age or older?
Are you over the age of 18?
Can you provide proof that you are at least 18 years old?
Do you have any relatives or family members currently employed at this company?
Are you related to anyone currently employed here?
Do you have a relative who is a current employee?
Have you previously been employed by this company?
Have you ever worked for this company before?
Are you a former employee?
Are you subject to any non-compete, non-solicitation, or other restrictive covenant agreement?
Are you currently bound by a non-compete agreement or restrictive covenant?
Do you have any commitments to any other person or entity that might affect your ability to perform?
Are there any other commitments that could limit your ability to fulfill this role?
Do you consent to the use of artificial intelligence tools in the recruitment process?
Do you agree to the use of AI in the hiring process?
Do you agree to the terms and conditions?
I agree to the privacy policy and terms of use
Would you like to be considered for future job opportunities?
Are you a citizen or national of a country in Group D?
Are you a citizen or national of a restricted country?
If Yes, have you ever held a J-1 or J-2 exchange visitor visa?
Have you ever held a J-1 or J-2 exchange visitor visa?
Have you ever been on a J-1 or J-2 visa?
If you are not authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime and indefinite basis, please provide your current status
Please provide your current immigration or visa status
What is your current visa or work authorization status?
Please provide your current status
Please add your Country of Citizenship or Countries of Citizenship if dual
What is your country of citizenship?
Country of citizenship
Please list your country or countries of citizenship
Are you now or have you previously been employed by Analog Devices Inc. or Maxim Integrated as a full-time regular employee or in a contract/temporary or coop-intern capacity?*
Will you need to be sponsored for a work visa by Analog Devices – either now or in the future – to work for (or continue to work for) Analog Devices?*
* ADI has a policy addressing the employment of relatives. Do you currently have relatives working at Analog Devices?*Select One

* Are you bound by any agreements with your current or previous employer that limit your actions after leaving their company? If yes, share the specific type of agreement and when it expires.Examples:Non-compete agreements, which prevent you from working for a competitorNon-solicitation agreements, which restrict you from soliciting clients or employees from your former employer.*

ADI would like to consider you for additional and future job openings using AI tools that may compare your application and other relevant information to the requirements of those job openings. If a match is found, our recruiters may contact you about these opportunities.  Your consent is voluntary and will not affect your current application.  By selecting "Yes," you consent to the use of your data for this purpose and to be contacted by our recruiters for these roles.  By selecting "No," you do

Are you currently, have you ever been, or has the government ever proposed that you be excluded, debarred, suspended or otherwise ineligible from participation in any federal or state health care program or other government procurement programs (e.g., Medicare, Medicaid)?*

Have you ever had, or do you anticipate receiving, any disciplinary action taken on your professional license, certification, or credentials? (Including, but not limited to reprimands, probation, revocation, and suspension).*

Have you ever been employed by Citi or any of its predecessor companies (including but not limited to Citibank, Citicorp, Banamex, Salomon Brothers, or Smith Barney) whether as an employee or via an agency or as a contractor, temporary worker or consultant?*
Are you legally authorized to work in the country or jurisdiction where the position to which you are applying is located?*

Do you have any relatives (1) or persons in any other Covered Relationships (2) that are part of Citi's (3) Senior Management (4)?(1) Relatives mean spouses, domestic partners, civil union partners, parents, grandparents, great-grandparents, children, grandchildren, great grandchildren, siblings, aunts, great aunts, uncles, great uncles, nieces, great nieces, nephews, great nephews, first cousins, wards or guardians. Relatives also include in-laws and step-relatives in these same relationships.(
Race/Ethnicity (select all that apply)
Have you previously been employed by Wells Fargo or engaged as a contingent resource?*
Are you a current or former Wells Fargo employee?*

Have you ever been disciplined by an administrative agency or the subject of an administrative order relating to conduct or practices involving any aspect of the financial services, insurance, securities, or real estate industries or any other licensed industry profession?An Administrative agency is a government body authorized to implement legislative directives by developing more precise and technical rules.*

Do you have any fiduciary appointments (such as an executor, personal representative, administrator, guardian, trustee, or any similar fiduciary designation) that involve a current Wells Fargo customer, or someone you know that intends to become a Wells Fargo customer (for example, a current client)?*

Do you have a family relationship (biological, adopted, marriage, domestic partnership, civil union, or some other arrangement), or are you a close personal contact (a regular and ongoing close connection that may be personal, romantic, or financial) of any employees, contingent resources, or board members of Wells Fargo or its subsidiaries?*
